member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension
member.summary: Allows access to controller-specific functions.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.SetTriggerEffect(Rewired.ControllerExtensions.DualSenseTriggerType,Rewired.ControllerExtensions.IDualSenseTriggerEffect)
member.summary: Sets a trigger effect.
member.param: The trigger which will play the effect.
member.returns: True on success, false if an error occurred.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetTriggerEffectStates
member.summary: Gets the current trigger effect states.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetAccelerometerValue
member.summary: Gets the value from the accelerometer converted to Unity's coordinate system. The value returned could be thought of as a gravity vector and user acceleration combined. If using this value to apply a force in the direction of the vector, invert each axis first. This value represents the last value reported by the accelerometer.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetAccelerometerValueRaw
member.summary: Gets the raw value from the accelerometer as reported by the device. Note: Device coordinate system does not match Unity's.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetGyroscopeValueRaw
member.summary: Gets the raw value from the gyroscope as reported by the device. Note: Device coordinate system does not match Unity's.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetGyroscopeValue
member.summary: Gets the value from the gyroscope converted to Unity's coordinate system.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetOrientation
member.summary: Gets the orientation converted to Unity's coordinate system.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.ResetOrientation
member.summary: Resets the orientation.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.SetLightColor(UnityEngine.Color)
member.summary: Sets the light color. Alpha can be used to set intensity.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.SetLightColor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the light color.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.SetLightColor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the light color.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.maxTouches
member.summary: Number of simultaneous touches supported by this device.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.touchCount
member.summary: The current touch count.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetTouchId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the touch id for the touch at the specified index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetTouchPosition(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular index normalized to a 0 - 1 range. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The index of the touch for which to return position.
member.returns: True if the touch at index is currently touching. False if there is no touch at index.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.GetTouchPositionByTouchId(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector2@)
member.summary: Gets the touch position for a particular touch id normalized to a 0 - 1 range. (Left = 0, Bottom = 0)
member.param: The id of the touch for which to return position.
member.returns: True if the touch at touchId is currently touching. False if there is no touch at touchId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.IsTouching(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the current touch id is valid for any currently active touch.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerDualSenseExtension.IsTouchingByTouchId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the current touch id is valid for any currently active touch.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension
member.summary: Allows access to controller-specific functions.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.nativePlayerIndex
member.summary: Gets the native player index. This corresponds to playerIndex in the Game Controller framework. This is only useful for direct interaction with the Game Controller framework.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.nativeDevicePointer
member.summary: Gets the native pointer to the GCController object. This is only useful for direct interaction with the Game Controller framework. If the pointer is unavailable or invalid, returns IntPtr.Zero.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.GetElementSfSymbolsName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the native system symbol name of a controller element. If the element has been remapped by the user in the OS, this will return the remapped symbol name.
member.returns: Native system symbol name of a controller element.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.GetElementUnmappedSfSymbolsName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the native un-remapped system symbol name of a controller element.
member.returns: Un-remapped system symbol name of a controller element.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.GetElementLocalizedName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the native localized name of a controller element. If the element has been remapped by the user in the OS, this will return the remapped localized name.
member.returns: Native localized name of a controller element.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerExtension.GetElementUnmappedLocalizedName(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the native un-remapped localized name of a controller element.
member.returns: Un-remapped localized name of a controller element.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput
member.summary: Provides access to input-related methods and settings at runtime.

member.name: T:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment
member.summary: Provides access to controller assignment-related settings at runtime.

member.name: P:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.assignJoysticksByNativePlayerIndex
member.summary: If enabled, Joysticks will be assigned based on the GCController player index associated with the controller to a specific Rewired Player. The GCController player index to Rewired Player associations must be set up using the other functions in this class before they will have any effect.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.GetNativePlayerIndicesForPlayer(Rewired.Player,System.Collections.Generic.List{Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex})
member.summary: Get the native GCController player index associated with the Rewired Player.
member.param: A list to receive the native GCController player indices. The incoming list will be cleared by the function.
member.returns: The number of native GCController player indices returned in the results list.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.GetNativePlayerIndicesForPlayer(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex})
member.summary: Get the native GCController player indices associated with the Rewired Player.
member.param: A list to receive the native GCController player indexs. The incoming list will be cleared by the function.
member.returns: The number of native GCController player indices returned in the results list.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.GetPlayerForNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex)
member.summary: Gets the Rewired Player associated with the native GCController player index.
member.returns: Rewired Player for the native GCController player index. If none, returns null.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.GetPlayerIdForNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex)
member.summary: Gets the Rewired Player id associated with the native GCController player index.
member.param: Native GCController player index. This corresponds to XUserLocalId.
member.returns: Player id for the native GCController player index. If none, returns -1.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.SetPlayerForNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex,Rewired.Player)
member.summary: Sets the native GCController player index associated with the Rewired Player.
member.param: Native GCController player index. This corresponds to XUserLocalId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.SetPlayerForNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the native GCController player index associated with the Rewired Player.
member.param: Native GCController player index. This corresponds to XUserLocalId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.RemoveNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex)
member.summary: Removes the Player association for the local XUser id.
member.param: Native GCController player index. This corresponds to XUserLocalId.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.ContainsNativePlayerIndex(Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex)
member.summary: Determines if there is a Player association with the native GCController player index.
member.param: Native GCController player index. This corresponds to XUserLocalId.
member.returns: True if there is a Player associated to this native GCController player index, or False if not.

member.name: M:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerInput.ControllerAssignment.ClearNativePlayerIndices
member.summary: Clears all native GCController player index to Player associations.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex.Unset
member.summary: The default index for a player on a controller. No lights are lit on the controller.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex.One
member.summary: Specifies that player one is using this controller.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex.Two
member.summary: Specifies that player two is using this controller.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex.Three
member.summary: Specifies that player three is using this controller.

member.name: F:Rewired.Platforms.Apple.GameController.GCControllerPlayerIndex.Four
member.summary: Specifies that player four is using this controller.

members.member: Events ::SDL_USEREVENT through ::SDL_LASTEVENT are for your use, and should be allocated with SDL_RegisterEvents()
This last event is only for bounding internal arrays
\brief Joystick hat position change event structure (event.jhat.*)
\brief Game controller axis motion event structure (event.caxis.*)

\brief An event used to request a file open by the system (event.drop.*) This event is disabled by default, you can enable it with SDL_EventState() \note If you enable this event, you must free the filename in the event.

\brief A video driver dependent system event (event.syswm.*) This event is disabled by default, you can enable it with SDL_EventState()
\note If you want to use this event, you should include SDL_syswm.h.

\name Usage page 0x07
These values are from usage page 0x07 (USB keyboard page).

\name Usage page 0x0C
These values are mapped from usage page 0x0C (USB consumer page).

\name Walther keys
These are values that Christian Walther added (for mac keyboard?).

member.name: M:Rewired.InputSources.SDL2.SDL2InputSource.GetGameControllerCount
member.summary: The value returned cannot be used to iterate! Always use GetJoystickCount!

member.name: M:Rewired.InputSources.SDL2.SDL2Joystick.ProcessAxisValue(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert from +/- 32768 to +/- 1.0f
